mapper.select: select d.*,k.Kname_wq from dock_wq as d left join keshi_wq as k on k.Kid_wq = d.YkeshiId_wq where d.Ybianhao_wq=#{Ybianhao_wq} and d.Ypwd_wq=#{Ypwd_wq}
select d.*,k.Kname_wq from dock_wq as d left join keshi_wq as k on k.Kid_wq = d.YkeshiId_wq
select d.*,k.Kname_wq from dock_wq as d left join keshi_wq as k on k.Kid_wq = d.YkeshiId_wq where d.Yid_wq = #{Yid_wq}
select d.*,k.Kname_wq from dock_wq as d left join keshi_wq as k on k.Kid_wq = d.YkeshiId_wq where d.YkeshiId_wq = #{0}
select d.*,k.Kname_wq from dock_wq as d left join keshi_wq as k on k.Kid_wq = d.YkeshiId_wq where k.Kname_wq = #{Kname_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select d.*,k.Kname_wq from dock_wq as d left join keshi_wq as k on k.Kid_wq = d.YkeshiId_wq where d.Yname_wq like #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select d.*,k.Kname_wq from dock_wq as d left join keshi_wq as k on k.Kid_wq = d.YkeshiId_wq where d.Yid_wq=#{0}
mapper.insert: insert into dock_wq ( Ybianhao_wq, Yname_wq, Ypwd_wq, Ytel_wq, Ysex_wq, YkeshiId_wq, Yimg_wq, Yattr_wq, Yjianjie_wq, Yage_wq, yaddTime_wq ) values ( #{Ybianhao_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Yname_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Ypwd_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Ytel_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Ysex_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{YkeshiId_wq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{Yimg_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Yattr_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Yjianjie_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Yage_wq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{yaddTime_wq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update dock_wq set Yname_wq = #{Yname_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Ypwd_wq = #{Ypwd_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Ytel_wq = #{Ytel_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Ysex_wq = #{Ysex_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YkeshiId_wq = #{YkeshiId_wq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Yimg_wq = #{Yimg_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Yattr_wq = #{Yattr_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Yjianjie_wq = #{Yjianjie_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Yage_wq = #{Yage_wq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, yaddTime_wq = #{yaddTime_wq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where Yid_wq = #{Yid_wq,jdbcType=INTEGER }

update dock_wq set Yname_wq = #{Yname_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Ypwd_wq = #{Ypwd_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Ytel_wq = #{Ytel_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Ysex_wq = #{Ysex_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YkeshiId_wq = #{YkeshiId_wq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Yattr_wq = #{Yattr_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Yjianjie_wq = #{Yjianjie_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Yage_wq = #{Yage_wq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, yaddTime_wq = #{yaddTime_wq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where Yid_wq = #{Yid_wq,jdbcType=INTEGER }
